root.name: Crystal's Pony Tale
root.description: OverviewA video game aimed at kids, mostly girls, that focuses on you playing as Crystal or as a pony you have customized yourself. You travel on a journey to save your other pony friends from the evil witch who has imprisoned them. Over the course of the game, you collect crystals to free your trapped friends from locations such as a meadow, a cave, and a forest. There are loads of hidden secrets and enemies to avoid. Other items you pick up along the way are apples and things that glitter.After defeating the evil witch, you see the ponies live happily ever after as they attend a party in a rainbow castle.
